name: Donald Trap
description:
The year is 2029, after 8 major financial crisis, the world has gone mad...
Civilization has collapsed.
In New york, some guys are trying to survive in a devastated Wall Street, fighting against crazy traders, and other weirdos, source of all problems...

Controls:
Mouse to aim and shoot
Arrows to move

You have to push your enemies with your gun in the traps scattered all over the level!

Team:

Thomas Baron - Programmation
Sylvain Guerrero - Programmation/FX
Mojo - 2D artist
nonamenosocks - 2D artist/Animation
Grizzly Cogs - Music/Sound-design

This is a jam game (a 48 hours one), the subject was "it's a trap !"
